attributes.action: Drug and alcohol testing for members of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: I believe in order for public faith to be restored in these right honourable members and public servants this should be mandatory.
attributes.background: Members of parliament should be held to a higher account than members of the public, these individuals vote on laws and as such should live by them. Decisions that effect the future of our country should not be made under the influence of any alcohol or illegal drug.
